resources.string: SagoPermission
Next
App settings
Some permissions required
Our apps require access to certain permissions to function properly. Your privacy is our number one priority. To learn more, please read our privacy policy. http://www.sagomini.com/privacypolicy
Our apps require access to one or more permissions on your device to function properly. Please allow access under Settings > Apps > %1$s > Permissions
Write to external storage
Write permission required
%1$s requires permission to write save files to the device storage to function properly. Tap \'Next\' to allow %2$s to write to the device storage.
%1$s requires permission to write save files to your device to function properly. Please allow access under Settings > Apps > %2$s > Permissions
Read external storage
Read permission required
%1$s requires access to read from the device storage to function properly. Tap \'Next\' to allow %2$s to read from the device storage.
%1$s requires access to read from the device storage to function properly. Please allow access under Settings > Apps > %2$s > Permissions
Camera
Read phone state permission required
%1$s requires access to the camera to function properly. Tap \'Next\' to allow %2$s camera access.
%1$s requires access to the camera to function properly. Please allow access under Settings > Apps > %2$s > Permissions
Read Phone State
We need to read phone state
%1$s requires permission to read phone state on the device to function properly. Tap \'Next\' to allow %2$s to read the phone state.
%1$s requires permission to read phone state to function properly. Please allow access to read phone state under Settings > Apps > %2$s > Permissions
Access Fine Location
We need to Access Fine Location
%1$s requires permission to Access Fine Location on the device to function properly. Tap \'Next\' to allow %2$s to Access Fine Location.
%1$s requires permission to Access Fine Location to function properly. Please allow access to Access Fine Location under Settings > Apps > %2$s > Permissions
Record audio
Recording audio permission required
%1$s requires permission to record audio to function properly. Tap \'Next\' to allow %2$s to grant permission for recording audio.
%1$s requires permission to record audio to function properly. Please allow access under Settings > Apps > %2$s > Permissions
